price: 23. y han dicho (a la gente): ‘No abandonen sus divinidades; no abandonen a Wadd, a Sua’, a Yaguz, a Ya’uq y a Nasr[1084]’.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدّٗا وَلَا سُوَاعٗا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرٗا
footnotes: [1084]  Se trata de los nombres de los ídolos a los que adoraba el pueblo de Noé.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: waqālū lā tadharunna ālihatakum walā tadharunna waddan walā suwāʿan walā yaghūtha wayaʿūqa wanasran
